body:
Now that I've read `pax(1)`, yes, I can see what you're saying. It looks like it was introduced in 10682799, which I reviewed but evidently didn't watch closely enough.

The POSIX doc for `pax(1)` is the *only* documentation for the special PAX headers, unless you've got a reference to something more authoritative.

Why does `pax(1)` recommend using a PID if it has no value?
